Text:
What is the diff between these two, can anybody please explain
http://thepiratebay.sx/torrent/8004361/Hotel.Transylvania.2012.1080p.BluRay.DTS.x264-PublicHD

The other one has a higher video bit rate and an extra audio track. The higher the video bit rate, the better the picture, not sure if you can tell the differences though since it's a cartoon.

This will fit on a dvd-r while the other one will fit on a dual layer dvd-r
higher video bit rate take up more space, hence, the bigger size of the file
